text: Kniphofia reflexa is a species of plant which is native to Cameroon and Nigeria.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesHepper, F.N. (ed.) (1968). Flora of West Tropical Africa , ed. 2, 3(1): 1-276. Its natural habitat is swamps. It is threatened by habitat loss.Cheek, M. & Pollard, B.J. 2000. Kniphofia reflexa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==References== Category:Flora of Cameroon Category:Flora of Nigeria Category:Plants described in 1967 reflexa Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Kniphofia reflexa
